actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the telecasting of professional basketball games during certain periods when regularly scheduled  intercollegiate or interscholastic basketball or football games are played, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that the antitrust laws shall apply to any joint agreement which permits telecasting of professional football or basketball games during periods (Friday nights and Saturdays from the second Friday in September through the last Saturday in March) when regularly scheduled intercollegiate or interscholastic basketball or football games are played. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 1293)

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the telecasting of professional basketball games during certain periods when regularly scheduled  intercollegiate or interscholastic basketball or football games are played, and for other purposes.
